articles.title: Moderate physical activity reduces frequent hospital admissions in middle and older age - News-Medical.Net
articles.description: Men and women aged 40-79 are at significantly lower (25-27%) risk of long or frequent hospital admissions if they do some form of physical activity, a new study suggests.
articles.content:

articles.description: There are so many bodies, relatives are being asked to search through unidentified remains themselves.
articles.content:
